title: i want to delete my account
body: i did something wrong and i want to delete it how can i delete it?

replies.body:
I'm slightly confused by what you mean.  What did you "do wrong" that you would want to delete it completely?  We do have [a way to completely delete your account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202647784) if you wish to take those steps.

Otherwise, I may be able to help depending on what the issue is!  Let me know!
ok now i corected the thing that i did wrong thnx for information
